Row.Text: Open your borders to them.[n][icon:YIELD_GOLD] +6 per turn.

Do a Research Collaboration with another Leader.[n]Accepted: You receive +12[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science per turn. Other Leader receives +6[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science per turn.[n]Supported: Both Leaders receive +18[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science per turn.
[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] +18 per turn for both Leaders.
[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] +6 per turn.[n]{1_initialName} receives [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] +12 per turn.

Have a Cultural Exchange with another Leader.[n]Accepted: You receive +12[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture per turn. Other Leader receives +6[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture per turn.[n]Supported: Both Leaders receive +18[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture per turn.
[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] +18 per turn for both Leaders.
[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] +6 per turn.[n]{1_initialName} receives [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] +12 per turn.

Have Open Markets with another Leader.[n]Accepted: You receive +12[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold per turn. Other Leader receives +6[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold per turn.[n]Supported: Both Leaders receive +18[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold per turn.
[icon:YIELD_GOLD] +18 per turn received by both Leaders.
[icon:YIELD_GOLD] +6 per turn.[n]{1_initialName} receives [icon:YIELD_GOLD] +12 per turn.

Have Local Festivals with another Leader.[n]Accepted: You receive +6[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness per turn in all Cities. Other Leader receives +6[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence per turn.[n]Supported: Both Leaders receive +9[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness per turn in Cities.
[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] +9 per turn in Cities for both Leaders.
[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] +6 per turn.[n]{1_initialName} receives [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] +6 per turn in Cities.

Share agricultural goods with another Leader.[n]Accepted: You receive +6[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food per turn in Towns. Other Leader receives +6[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold per turn.[n]Supported: Both Leaders receive +9[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food per turn in Towns.
[icon:YIELD_FOOD] +9 per turn in Towns for both Leaders.
[icon:YIELD_GOLD] +6 per turn.[n]{1_initialName} receives [icon:YIELD_FOOD] +6 per turn in Towns.
[icon:YIELD_GOLD] +6 per turn.[n]The other Leader has your claimed territory revealed to them over time.
[icon:YIELD_GOLD] +6 per turn.[n]Other Leader's Units get +2 Combat Strength.
[icon:YIELD_GOLD] +90.[n]{1_initialName} can start an additional Trade Route with you.

Have Ginseng Agreements with another Leader.[n]Accepted: You receive +9[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food per turn in your Cities. Other Leader receives +6[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food per turn in their Cities.[n]Supported: Both Leaders receive +15[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food per turn in their Cities.
[icon:YIELD_FOOD] +15 per turn in both Leaders in their Cities.
[icon:YIELD_FOOD] +6 per turn in your Cities.[n]{1_initialName} receives [icon:YIELD_FOOD] +9 per turn in their Cities.
Make an ally into a Friend of Wei.[n]Accepted: Both Leaders receive +25%[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science.
Make an ally into a Friend of Wei.[n] [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] +25% received by both Leaders.
[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] +25%.[n]{1_initialName} receives [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] +25%.
Ideologies
Increase Relationship with Leaders in the same ideology. Decrease Relationship with players in different Ideologies.
